outputs.name: mat
outputs.description:
A window material that describes an entire glazing system, including
glass, gaps, and frame and can be assigned to a Honeybee Window
construction.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description:
Text to set the name for the material and to be incorporated into
a unique material identifier.

inputs.name: _u_factor
inputs.description:
A number for the U-factor of the glazing system [W/m2-K]
including standard air gap resistances on either side of the
glazing system.

inputs.name: _shgc
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the solar heat gain coefficient
of the glazing system. This includes both directly transmitted solar
heat as well as solar heat that is absorbed by the glazing system and
conducts towards the interior.

inputs.name: _t_vis_
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the visible transmittance of the
glazing system. (Default: 0.6).

code:
try:  # import the core honeybee dependencies
    from honeybee.typing import clean_and_id_ep_string, clean_ep_string
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import the honeybee-energy dependencies
    from honeybee_energy.material.glazing import EnergyWindowMaterialSimpleGlazSys
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee_energy:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    # set the default material properties
    _t_vis_ = 0.6 if _t_vis_ is None else _t_vis_
    name = clean_and_id_ep_string('WindowMaterial') if _name_ is None else \
        clean_ep_string(_name_)

    # create the material
    mat = EnergyWindowMaterialSimpleGlazSys(name, _u_factor, _shgc, _t_vis_)
    if _name_ is not None:
        mat.display_name = _name_
name: HB Window Material
description:
Create a simple window material to describe an entire glazing system, including
glass, gaps, and frame. This material can be plugged into the "HB Window
Construction" component.
-
